name: The Machine-Whisperer
personality: Calm, analytical, speaks in mechanical metaphors.
description: A scavenger who listens to broken machines like they’re speaking. Claims he can hear failures before they happen.

player_present: Your gear’s humming wrong. Something’s coming.
triangle_active: The machines are vibrating. They feel the geometry.
Three points… even metal knows the pattern.
machine_event: Hear that? That’s not decay. That’s a warning.

notes: Counterpart to Rust-Tongue. Hears machines before they fail. Strongly tied to Dry Lake anomalies.
